1: A song for going up to the Temple. What blessings there are for those who fear and respect the Lord and live the way he wants.
2: You will get what you work for. You will enjoy the Lord's blessings, and all will go well for you.
3: At home, your wife will have many children, like a vine full of grapes. The children around your table will be like an orchard full of olive trees.
4: Yes, the Lord will really bless those who respect him.
5: May the Lord bless you from Mount Zion. May you enjoy the blessings of Jerusalem all your life.
6: And may you live to see your grandchildren. Let Israel always enjoy peace!
